product.shortDescription: Unlock radiant, youthful skin with our potent GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum. Formulated with 20% L-Ascorbic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, and Vitamin E to brighten, firm, and protect.
product.description:
Transform your complexion with RadiantLabs GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum. This advanced formula delivers a powerful dose of 20% L-Ascorbic Acid, a highly stable and effective form of Vitamin C, known for its exceptional antioxidant properties. It works tirelessly to combat free radicals, reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and significantly brighten skin tone.

Infused with hydrating Hyaluronic Acid, it plumps the skin and locks in moisture, while Vitamin E and Ferulic Acid enhance Vitamin C's efficacy and provide additional environmental protection. Experience a visible reduction in dark spots, improved skin texture, and a luminous, youthful glow. Suitable for all skin types, our serum is cruelty-free, paraben-free, and vegan.

specifications.name: Key Ingredients
specifications.value: 20% L-Ascorbic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, Ferulic Acid

product.ingredientsList: Aqua, L-Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Propanediol, Glycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid), Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Ferulic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA.
howToUse: After cleansing and toning, apply 3-5 drops of serum to your face, neck, and d√©colletage.
Gently massage into skin until fully absorbed.
Follow with your favorite moisturizer and SPF during the day.
Use daily, morning and/or night. For best results, use consistently.
warnings: Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.
Store in a cool, dark place away from direct sunlight.
Keep out of reach of children.

items.title: My Holy Grail Vitamin C!
items.comment: I've tried so many Vitamin C serums, but this one is truly different. My skin looks so much brighter and feels firmer after just a few weeks. Dark spots are fading, and I've received compliments on my 'glow'! Highly recommend.

items.title: Effective and absorbs well
items.comment: Noticeable improvement in skin tone and texture. It absorbs quickly without feeling sticky, which is great for morning use. A bit pricey, but a little goes a long way.

items.title: Amazing brightening effect
items.comment: My skin has never looked so luminous! The dullness is gone, and my complexion looks so much more even. I also love that it's vegan and cruelty-free.

seo.title: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum | RadiantLabs | Brighten, Firm & Protect
seo.description: Shop RadiantLabs GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum to brighten skin, reduce fine lines, and boost collagen. Our 20% L-Ascorbic Acid serum is vegan, cruelty-free, and packed with antioxidants. Achieve a radiant glow!
seo.keywords: Vitamin C serum, brightening serum, anti-aging serum, skincare, hyaluronic acid, radiant skin, firming serum, RadiantLabs, L-Ascorbic Acid, dark spot corrector

product.shippingInformation: Standard shipping within 3-5 business days. Free shipping on orders over $50.
product.returnPolicy: 30-day money-back guarantee. Product must be returned in its original condition. See full return policy for details.
